HediffDef.label: toxin round
HediffDef.description: Neurotoxin in the bloodstream. Causes nausea and severe degradation of neuromotor functions. \nAt high doses, toxic buildup can have severe health effects. Even at low doses, it can generate cancers. \nCreatures who die with toxic buildup cannot be eaten.

HediffDef.label: Freeze
HediffDef.description: Dangerously low core body temperature. Unless re-warmed, hypothermia gets worse and ends in death. Recovery is quick once the victim is re-warmed. Avoid hypothermia by wearing warm clothes in cold environments.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Acccelerator slug
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Minature pellets generated from a weapon's internal ammunition block, which are first reduced to near weightlessness by a mass effect field and then propelled to lethal speed by magnetic forces.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Armor-Piercing acccelerator slug
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Features a hardened tungsten carbide penetrator core for increased armor penetration. Causes less internal tissue damage.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Cryo acccelerator slug
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with cryogenic agents that freezes your enemies in place upon impact.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: High Explosive acccelerator slug
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with high explosive agent that detonate upon impact.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Incendiary
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with incendiary agent that ignites after impact.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Disruptor
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Designed to combat mechanoids and shielding, the round creates an electrical current on impact, disrupting electronic systems temporarily.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Toxin
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Designed to combat organic targets, injects the target with a painful neuratoxin upon penetration. Inflicts extreme nausea and neuro paralysis to the victim.

ThingDef.label: Basic Thermal clip
ThingDef.description: Thermal clips designed to fit almost all mass accelerator weapons. It allows mass accelerator weapons to fire continuously without needing to slow down in order to cool. It is best not to question where the projectile itself comes from.

ThingDef.label: AP Thermal clip
ThingDef.description: Thermal clips designed to fit almost all mass accelerator weapons. This one penetrates armour better.

ThingDef.label: Cryo Thermal clip
ThingDef.description: Thermal clips designed to fit almost all mass accelerator weapons. This one makes your enemy slow and cumberson.

ThingDef.label: HE Thermal clip
ThingDef.description: Thermal clips designed to fit almost all mass accelerator weapons.

ThingDef.label: incendiary Thermal clip
ThingDef.description: Thermal clips designed to fit almost all mass accelerator weapons. Set enemy on fire.

ThingDef.label: Disruptor Thermal clip
ThingDef.description: Thermal clips designed to fit almost all mass accelerator weapons. This one makes your enemy combust.

ThingDef.label: Toxin Thermal clip
ThingDef.description: Thermal clips designed to fit almost all mass accelerator weapons.
